snippet: The introduction of Fairlife is one way Coca-Cola is diversifying its offerings as Americans turn away from soft drinks.
abstract: Coca-Cola will introduce premium milk beverage called Fairlife, which will have more protein and less sugar than standard milk, and cost twice as much; move is part of company's effort to diversify away from soft drinks amid changing tastes.
lead_paragraph: The introduction of Fairlife is one way Coca-Cola is diversifying its offerings as Americans turn away from soft drinks.
